message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $145. It's a great deal and I'm confident you'll find it very useful. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer.  I'm interested in the product but $145 is a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $125 for it. Let me know what you think.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $125 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $135. This is still a fair price considering the value of the product. Let me know if you're interested.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to come down in price, but $135 is still a bit too much for me.  I'm ready to pay $130. This is a fair price considering my budget and the value I see in the product.  Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
Bob,  I understand your position. I'm willing to go down to $132. This is a very fair price considering the value of the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down to $132. I'm willing to go to $131.  This is my final offer, as it's as close as I can get to my budget.  I'm confident we can finalize this deal.
